ctx: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce THeap_Join to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (Hjoin h1 h2 h3 Hvalid1 Hvalid2 n).
exceptions.exn: In environment h1, h2, h3 : THeap' Hjoin : fun_Join nat (option htype) h1 h2 h3 Hvalid1 : forall n : nat, h1 n = Some short1 <-> h1 (S n) = Some short2 Hvalid2 : forall n : nat, h2 n = Some short1 <-> h2 (S n) = Some short2 n : nat The term "h1" has type "THeap'" while it is expected to have type "nat".

ctx: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hjoin1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hjoin1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros h1 h2 h3 Hjoin Hvalid1 Hvalid2. unfold THvalid in *. unfold THeap_Join' in Hjoin. intros n. unfold THeap_Join in Hjoin. specialize (Hjoin h1 h2 h3 Hvalid1 Hvalid2 n). destruct Hjoin as [Hjoin1 Hjoin2]. destruct Hjoin1 as [Hjoin1 _]. apply Hjoin1.
